item.title: Gascony Avenue, 5th July

item.title: Slippery park surface, 5th July

item.title: Trees on at the entry of Telegraph path near Green Lane need pruning, 5th July
item.description:
The trees on telegraph path are creating a lot of darkness on the path. They are also starting to come into the property and the overhanging branches are creating a risk of damage to the car parked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 131, Green Lane, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet
